vulnerability.name: USN-4468-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4468-1 fixed a vulnerability in Bind. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Dave Feldman, Jeff Warren, and Joel Cunningham discovered that Bind  incorrectly handled certain truncated responses to a TSIG-signed request. A  remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Bind to crash,  resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2020-8622)

statements.status_notes: Bind could be made to crash if it received a specially crafted request. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
